com.jaxio.celerio.util

Interface Hierarchical<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Entity

    public interface Hierarchical<T>
    Elements that are part of a hierarchical structure, such as entities in JPA, implements this interface to enable navigation in the structure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<T> getChildren()
      Returns the children elements
      java.lang.String getName() 
      T getParent()
      Returns the parent of this element or null if this element is the root.
      java.util.List<T> getParents()
      Returns the parents of this element or an empty list if this element is the root.
      T getRoot()
      Returns the root element of the hierarchy or self if this element is the root.
      boolean isRoot()
      Returns true if the element is the root of the hierarchy.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

      • isRoot

        boolean isRoot()
        Returns true if the element is the root of the hierarchy.

      • getRoot

        T getRoot()
        Returns the root element of the hierarchy or self if this element is the root.

      • getParent

        T getParent()
        Returns the parent of this element or null if this element is the root.

      • getParents

        java.util.List<T> getParents()
        Returns the parents of this element or an empty list if this element is the root. The first element in the list is the root.

      • getChildren

        java.util.List<T> getChildren()
        Returns the children elements
